snippet: Major Wall Street indexes were down more than 1 percent at one point as the markets felt the pressure of the continuing shutdown of the government.
lead_paragraph: Major Wall Street indexes were down more than 1 percent at one point as the markets felt the pressure of the continuing shutdown of the government.

headline.main: Stocks Slide on Day 3 of Shutdown
headline.print_headline: Stocks Slide on Day 3 of Shutdown
